Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:



The three creations of twelve ancient Vok priests stood at the edge of the 
great pool of lava in Mt. St. Hilary, original home of the Ark but was now 
home to their relatively small craft.

Raising both arms high up in the air, a golden sphere shape rose out of the 
lava and floated next to the Vok, an entryway sliding open and the three 
creations closing in.  The entryway closed and the ship went back into the 
lava that would mask its signatures and wouldn't harm it because of superior 
shields that fed off the lava like it was energy.

With the energy the Vok would conserve and come back when the ship told them 
it was a more beneficial time to arise.
